blackbeard:WeaponKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack card, one Durability of your rightmost Weapon is used and card's damage is increased by Weapon's Attack. You can equip a maximum of #b10 Weapons.

blackbeard:CannonballKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Cannonballs are #b0 cost attacks that deal #b6 #b(8) damage and exhaust.

blackbeard:ResistanceKeyword.DESCRIPTION: You take less damage from enemy attacks. (Enemy intents always show actual incoming damage, with Resistance taken into account.) Resistance can be negative.

blackbeard:BleedKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Bleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.

blackbeard:ReapersMarkKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Whenever #b3 stacks are applied, they are removed and the creature loses HP equal to #b40% of its missing HP.

blackbeard:RustyThorns.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, deals damage back and reduces Rusty Thorns by #b1.

blackbeard:GoldenCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Golden Cannonballs are #b0 cost attacks that deal damage equal to 2% of Gold gained this run and exhaust.
